name: projects.profile.preferences
description: A Project Profile object is public by default, but portions of it can be set to private by modifying its preferences

api_endpoints.description: GET: List of Projects Profile Preference options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite Projects Profile Preference when found in request body

key_value_pairs.show_award_information: show/hide award_information in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_goals: show/hide goals in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_keywords: show/hide keywords in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_notebooks: show/hide notebooks in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_project_status: show/hide project_status in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_purpose: show/hide purpose in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_references: show/hide references in all interfaces (default: True)
